features: 【PRODUCT SIZE】: The dimension of our kitchen sink organizers is 17.5" (L) x 11.8" (W). Suitable for kitchen sink, undermount kitchen sink, rv sink, camping sink and other outdoor kitchen sinks, etc. But please measure your sink or kitchen counter FIRST before purchasing this over sink dish drying rack, then you will get the perfect kitchen sink organization and storage tools, kitchen accessories for countertop, rv accessories, apartment necessities, camping kitchen sink accessories, etc.

【MULTI-PURPOSE】: Our dish rack over the sink can not only be used as a dish drying mat to air-dry washed plates, dishes, bowls, bottles, cups, etc, but also as a fruit bowl for kitchen counter to hold washed fruits and vegetables, as a heat-proof and anti-slip cooling rack to hold hot pots or bakeware, as a drying mat for kitchen counter to unfreeze some frozen foods, as a small kitchen countertop to prepare food, and as a kitchen sink mats for bottom of kitchen sink.

【STURDY AND DURABLE】: The kitchen dish drying rack has a strong frame made with 18 304 stainless steel pipes, connected with high quality silicone. Make the kitchen rack over the sink rust resistant, waterproof, non-slip, support bearing up to 33lbs. The ideal kitchen hacks gadgets, apartment essentials for first apartment, kitchen essentials for new apartment, under the sink organizer, new house kitchen assesssories, home accessories, home essentials for new home, home gadgets,etc.

【ROLL UP DESIGN AND SAVING SPACE】: Soft silicone and foldable design make the over the sink dish rack easy to unfold for using, to roll up for storing when not in use. Just roll up the over the sink drying rack and put the roll up drying rack over sink in your cabinet for storage. This kitchen sink storage rack only take little space to storage, but can save your counter space and make your kitchen life more convenient.
【HEAT-RESISTANT AND FOOD SAFE】: The dish racks for kitchen counter with BPA-free, food safe grade silicone, is heat resistant up to 400°F (204°C), highly corrosion resistant and dishwasher safe.

【EASY TO CLEAN】: The bottle drying rack is made with stainless steel and silicone material, is rust-resistant, waterproof, oil-resistant, corrosion resistant. Easy to clean even if you use the kitchen drying mat for a long time. With long life service, our kitchen sink rack would be a great helpful kitchen gadgets tool.

【100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE】: For long life using, clean and dry the kitchen drying rack after each use. If you have ANY issues with the dish dryer you received, please contact us on order detail page.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Needed something like this for house/pet sitting for a friend who doesn’t have a dish rack. Couldn’t beat the price, under $5 when I got it, the portability, or the ease of use. How long it’ll last I don’t know, I really only needed it for the week and for that time it worked great, fit perfectly over her apartment sink, let the few dishes I used dry quickly, was sturdy enough for a heavy dinner plate and glass… glass. I never worried it would collapse under the weight and break her dishes. It didn’t rust. It rinsed, dried, and rolled up again easily for transport home and doesn’t take up a ton of space that way, so it was easy to tuck it into a corner of a cabinet for next time I may need it. I’m thinking I might pull it out for the holidays when there’s always a ton of extra pots and pans around, and use it on the washing side of the sink when everything’s clean and just needs to dry.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great over my large sink
reviews.reviewText: This is the most useful kitchen sink item ever! I have a large sink and this rack is perfect for placing my cutting board over the sink when chopping or to keep from putting hot or greasy items on my new countertop. It adds more practicality of use to the sink area, with is easy to roll up and storage option. I am all about practicality, space, and storage and this rolling rack checks all the spots. The rods are sturdy, and the rubber ends keep it from sliding around when in use. A must have!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Space Saving Solution for Drying Dishes
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love my over the sink drying rack! It has been a game changer in my kitchen. The best part about it is that it doesn't take up much space at all. When I'm not using it, I can conveniently roll it up and store it away, which is great for my small kitchen.Not only is it super functional, but it's also easy to clean. I can quickly wipe it down or even throw it in the dishwasher. This has made my dishwashing routine so much more efficient.I would highly recommend this over the sink drying rack to anyone looking for a space-saving, easy-to-clean solution for drying dishes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for my Kitchen needs!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Fits my kitchen needs, fits perfect on my kitchens side sink, no longer does the washed dishes stay soggy on a drying pad. The quality is good, does not rust. The rubber feet on the rack hold in in place well, solid feel.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Much Better than Expected
reviews.reviewText: I was a little on the fence about this product, but I'm glad I made the purchase, it has become a permanent fixture in my sink and I've used it every single day since I bought it. Simple and effective, it allows your dishes to dry over the sink, just as advertised.One thing I have considered is bacteria transfer from the kitchen sink, and the possibility that my dish soap water is splashing back up to the dishes resting on the rack... The thought makes me just a little bit squeamish, but in truth, most drying solutions will suffer from the same issue (being close to the sink) and we do have immune systems for a reason. ;D Maybe not the best pick for germaphobe, but practical and effective for the rest of us.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Such a helpful product!
reviews.reviewText: A neighbor had this exact product on their sink and recommended it. It's perfect for my double kitchen sink. It holds many items and is very sturdy. The rubber edges don't mar my granite counters.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect in my RV
reviews.reviewText: I have a weird space in my rv, kitchen sink area. Counter space is limited, this is perfect basically adding counter space. Also, I can wash dishes, rinse, and drain over the sink all at the same time. Light weight. Easy to clean. When I'm finished, I roll it up, and store it. Wish I would have found this years ago.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars thes roll-over sink dish rack designs are ingenious! Just measure your sink before you buy.
reviews.reviewText: I've used every other design besides this one until now (the side sink rack with drainers, the microfibre matts, etc.) I recommend this design over all of them. Just measure your sink and what will fit and you're good. I saw an "expandable design" as well so if you ever move and end up with a bigger sink, viola!(I under-measured and wish I got a bigger one. My mistake was thinking the faucuet/dishwasher compoennts on my sink would get in the way - it doesnt. This is a very studry product that doesn't need much "ledge" to hold just great.)Now my dish washing is so easy and efficient. I was inefficient before without it b/c I woudl tend to wait until I had a whole dishwasher load before i washed/dried and put in the dishwasher. But that meant things i use daily (like my water shaker bottle for my nutrient/protein drinks) would sit there and do a "need now" wash with a semi-full sink of dirty dishes (but not enough to run a full dishwasher load).This rack has freed me to wash my daily things and dry them, even while i'm waiting to run a full dishwasher load. (The other thing i was running into was using the dishwasher as the dryer rack, but then i'd get confused which i washed already for next use vs waiting to be washed with a full dish washer load).yes.. i have to keep it super simple at my age. But this allows me to easily and visually know what's what. it's been much more of a game changer for me than i expected in my situation.

reviews.reviewTitle: Bon produit mais mauvaise grandeur reçue
reviews.reviewText: Le produit semble de qualité mais j'ai reçu la mauvaise grandeur qui était bien emballée dans l'emballage indiquant la bonne grandeur que j'aurais dû recevoir.
We use this every day for dishes, washing veg, it's not strong enough to support a heavy pot but that's reasonable given the cost...

This rack is a perfect addition to my small kitchen and is made of durable stainless steel. I love that I can use it to dry dishes of all sizes and even cut fruits and veggies on the cutting board that fits over it. The only minor drawback is that it can be a bit difficult to clean.

Love this dish rack. Fits perfectly on our double kitchen sink. Very secure and supports a surprising amount of weight. Easy to clean. Rolls up for convenient storage, but it looks so cool, we leave ours in place on top of the sink.

We don’t have a ton of counter space so committing to a conventional dry rack didn’t appeal to us. We tried this instead, using it covering half of our sink and it works perfectly for the items that can’t go on the dishwasher. If we need to use the full sink we just roll it back. It’s also easy to clean as well.
